texts.description: Upload your time series and let a GPU-powered NHITS model, built with neuralforecast and PyTorch, generate multi-step forecasts with probabilistic intervals. Designed for high-frequency signals and large-scale deployments.

facilities.title: Series Loader
facilities.description: As easy as dragging & dropping your CSV

facilities.title: Frequency
facilities.description: You pick the cadence (daily, hourly, weeklyâ€¦) .We handle the rest for flawless forecasting.

facilities.title: GPU NHITS Training
facilities.description: Trains an NHITS model with neuralforecast and PyTorch, using CUDA when available.

facilities.title: Probabilistic Output
facilities.description: Returns point forecasts plus lower and upper bounds for each future timestamp.

facilities.title: Model Summary
facilities.description: Stores a detailed technical summary and forecastingInfo back into ProjectForecasting.

facilities.title: FastAPI Endpoint
facilities.description: Exposes /forecast/ with horizon and level parameters for on-demand runs.

texts.description: Our forecasting engine combines NHITS (Neural Hierarchical Interpolation for Time Series) with PyTorch + neuralforecast running on GPU. For each project, the model is trained on the fly from your MongoDB time series, producing multi-step forecasts with confidence intervals in a single API call.

features.title: High-accuracy forecasts even on irregular or noisy data
features.description: NHITS consistently outperforms classic deep-learning models by delivering stable predictions even when the time series has high volatility or weak seasonality.

features.title: Captures long-term trends and short-term patterns at once
features.description: Its hierarchical architecture decomposes the series across multiple temporal scales, learning global behavior and local fluctuations simultaneously.

features.title: Probabilistic GPU forecasts
features.description: Uses normalization, NHITS on GPU when available, and insample residuals to deliver point forecasts with lower and upper bounds at your chosen confidence level.

features.title: More stable than LSTM, Transformers, and DeepAR
features.description: Unlike autoregressive models that accumulate error at every step, NHITS predicts directly over the horizon, producing smoother and more reliable long-range forecasts.

texts.description: These are some of the key scenarios where NHITS, running on GPU, delivers high-quality forecasts that directly impact your business decisions.

colors.cardHover: hover:bg-white dark:hover:bg-dark-950 hover:-translate-y-2 hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-violet-200/80 dark:hover:shadow-dark-850

services.title: Sales demand forecasting
services.description: Predict future sales by product, store or channel using NHITS, capturing promotions, seasonality and long-term trends in one deep-learning model.

services.title: Inventory & stock optimization
services.description: Anticipate stock levels, avoid stock-outs and overstock, and align purchase orders with realistic demand scenarios and confidence intervals.

services.title: Revenue & KPI projections
services.description: Generate forward-looking revenue and KPI curves, helping finance and management teams plan budgets, targets and what-if scenarios.

services.title: Supply chain & production planning
services.description: Use multi-step forecasts to align production, logistics and capacity with expected demand, reducing bottlenecks and last-minute firefighting.

services.title: Workforce & staffing needs
services.description: Forecast workload over time and translate it into staffing plans, shifts and scheduling decisions, smoothing peaks and underutilization.

services.title: Risk, peaks & anomalies
services.description: Identify potential spikes, drops and anomalous behavior in advance, combining NHITS forecasts with confidence bands and residual analysis.
